fullDescription.intro: Node creates connection to a Neo4j instance via BOLT protocol.
fullDescription.option: the hostname or URL of Neo4j server with port.
defines the maximum amount of connections.
use default (neo4j) graph for connection or provide a graph name.
the name of the database you want to connect to.

ports.inPort: A Credential, that can be embedded into the HTTP Authorization header. If this port is added, then all request done by the node will always use the Credential from the port, regardless of other node settings. The OAuth2 Authenticator nodes provide such a Credential for example.
